title: Kvardun: Redefining the Future of Blockchain-Enabled Artificial Intelligence
description: Artificial intelligence has rapidly shifted from being an experimental tool to becoming an indispensable part of how industries operate. From predictive analytics in finance and automated logistics in global supply chains to personalized healthcare and advanced creative tools, AI is now central to innovation. However, as adoption grows, one fundamental question continues to challenge both […]

title: Walmart prepares workforce for an AI-driven future
description: As artificial intelligence and demographic changes reshape the U.S. job market, the nation’s largest private employer is trying to identify the skills its workers and the broader labor force might need for the future.
content:

title: A.I. in School: What It Can and Can’t Do
description: Readers discuss artificial intelligence and the roles of students and parents. Also: Infants and screens; prizes for the president.
content:
To the Editor:
Re “Parents, Your Job Has Changed in the A.I. Era,” by Jenny Anderson and Rebecca Winthrop (Opinion guest essay, Sept. 12):
